page.title: 03Holy Trinity School Cont.
page.content: summer we have a school sports day and an open afternoon when we invite parents and friends to come and see the work of the school. At the end of the year we have a 'leavers party' which is for the children who are leaving. We have a fun rounders match against the parents, followed by a barbecue and a disco. {School Staff} Headmistress: Mrs. Mary E. Chick B.Ed. Teachers: Mrs. Maureen G. Norman Mrs. Wendy Sawyers G.G.S.M., L.G.S.M.,M.T.C.(Lond) Secretary:Mrs. Doreen Lovelock Welfare Assistant: Mrs. Pamela Smith Cook: Mrs. Susan Rosser Cook's Assistants: Mrs. Kim Russell Mrs. Sue Cubitt Cleaner in charge: Mrs. Irene Laidler Assistant cleaner: Mrs. Barraclough Gardener: Mr. Barraclough
